title: Himi 437
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
‘A e angahala hē mama’
o
,
Nofo hamumunoa,
Neongo pē ho’ maumau la
o
‘E ngalo pē kotoa.
Foki mai, foki mai!
2.
Ha’u ki he ‘api ho’ Tamai,
Foha maumau koloa;
Koe’uma’ā ho’ ‘aokai,
He ‘oku toe noa.
Foki mai, foki mai!
3.
‘Ē, tuku muʻa ho’ kai ngeʻes
i
,
Me’a ta’e’aonga ia;
He kuo fokotu’u ‘i hen
i
‘A e me’akai mo’onia.
Foki mai, foki mai!
4.
Ha’u ai pē mo ho telefua;
Lahi ‘a e vala hen
i
.
‘E fakakofu he ‘Otua
Ha kofu fuʻu lelei.
Foki mai, foki mai!
5.
‘Oku tatali ho’ Tamai
Ke ‘uma hono foh
a
.
Ke vave mai! He hono ai
Ha foki mei faʻitok
a
?
Foki mai, foki mai! *
